name: Blend In (felixantoinedup)
description:
Our game, Blend In, shows a chameleon teen that tries his best to fit in a group.

The main mechanic is about changing color while interacting with others. Showing the influence others may have on you.

The struggle we would like to communicate is that trying too hard to appeal to everybody around you might lead to yourself feeling lost.

In the end, we would like to encourage self-acceptance.

Thank you for playing this game
